subjects.name: Berserk
subjects.description: Triggers a Berserk Mode that increases all attack damage by {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk.DMGStandard * 100]}% while active. Berserk Mode will be active for {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk.BaseDuration]} seconds. Cooldown will trigger once Berserk ends.\n \nTaunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equiped in your hatchet, This ability cause a {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Berserk_Taunt.TauntDuration]}s taunts to all enemies within 8m. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
subjects.parsed_description:
Triggers a Berserk Mode that increases all attack damage by 20.0% while active. Berserk Mode will be active for 12.0 seconds. Cooldown will trigger once Berserk ends.

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equiped in your hatchet, This ability cause a 8.0s taunts to all enemies within 8m. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
subjects.en_description: Triggers a Berserk Mode that increases all attack damage by {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk.DMGStandard * 100]}% while active. Berserk Mode will be active for {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk.BaseDuration]} seconds. Cooldown will trigger once Berserk ends.\n \nTaunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equiped in your hatchet, This ability cause a {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Berserk_Taunt.TauntDuration]}s taunts to all enemies within 8m. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
subjects.de_description: Löst den Berserkermodus aus, in dem sich der Angriffsschaden um {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk.DMGStandard * 100]} % erhöht. Berserkermodus {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk.BaseDuration]} Sekunden lang aktiv. Abklingzeit wird nach dem Ende von Berserker ausgelöst.\n\nProvokationsedelstein kompatibel: Hast du einen Karneol-Edelstein in deinem Beil ausgerüstet, provoziert die Fertigkeit für {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Berserk_Taunt.TauntDuration]} Sek. alle Gegner innerhalb von 8 m. (Provokation führt dazu, dass Monster nur dich angreifen.)
subjects.fr_description: Déclenche un mode Rage qui augmente tous les dégâts infligés de {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk.DMGStandard * 100]} % lorsqu'il est actif. Reste actif durant {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk.BaseDuration]} secondes. Le temps de recharge se déclenchera lorsque l'effet de Rage prend fin.\n \nGemme de provocation compatible : Cette capacité provoque tous les ennemis présents dans un rayon de 8 mètres pendant {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Berserk_Taunt.TauntDuration]}s lorsqu'une cornaline est enchâssée dans votre hachette (les monstres provoqués se concentrent uniquement sur vous).
subjects.es_description: Activa el modo Furia y aumenta todos los daños de ataque en un {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk.DMGStandard * 100]} % mientras está activo. El modo Furia dura {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk.BaseDuration]} segundos. El tiempo de recarga comienza en cuanto acaba Furia.\n \nCompatibilidad con gema de provocación: si tienes una cornalina equipada en tu destral, esta habilidad provoca durante {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Berserk_Taunt.TauntDuration]} s a todos los enemigos en un radio de 8 m (los monstruos provocados solo te atacarán a ti).
subjects.it_description: Attiva la modalità Berserker, che aumenta di un {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk.DMGStandard * 100]}% tutti i danni dell'attacco mentre è attiva. La modalità Berserker rimane attiva per {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk.BaseDuration]} secondi. Il tempo di ricarica parte al termine di Berserker.\n \nProvocazione compatibile con le gemme: se hai una gemma di corniola equipaggiata nella tua accetta, questa abilità provoca tutti i nemici entro 8 metri per {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Berserk_Taunt.TauntDuration]} secondi (la provocazione fa sì che i mostri si concentrino solo su di te).
subjects.pl_description: Uruchamia tryb berserkera, w którym zadawane obrażenia zwiększają się o {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk.DMGStandard * 100]}%. Tryb berserkera będzie aktywny przez {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk.BaseDuration]} s. Gdy dobiegnie końca, włączy się czas odnowienia.\n \nKompatybilne z klejnotem prowokacji: Jeśli w twojej siekierce jest osadzony karneol, ta umiejętność przez {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Berserk_Taunt.TauntDuration]} s prowokuje wszystkich wrogów w promieniu 8 m (prowokacja sprawia, że potwory skupiają się tylko na tobie).
subjects.pt_description: Aciona um Modo Berserk que aumenta todo o dano de ataque em {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk.DMGStandard * 100]}% enquanto estiver ativo. O Modo Berserk ficará ativo durante {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk.BaseDuration]} s. O tempo de recarga é acionado quando o Berserk termina.\n \nCompatível com Gema de Provocação: Se você tiver uma gema Cornalina equipada em sua machadinha, a habilidade causa Provocação de {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Berserk_Taunt.TauntDuration]} s a todos os inimigos num raio de 8 m. (Provocação faz os monstros se concentrarem só em você.)

Compatibilidad con gema de provocación: si tienes una cornalina equipada en tu destral, esta habilidad provoca durante 8.0 s a todos los enemigos en un radio de 8 m (los monstruos provocados solo te atacarán a ti).

Kompatybilne z klejnotem prowokacji: Jeśli w twojej siekierce jest osadzony karneol, ta umiejętność przez 8.0 s prowokuje wszystkich wrogów w promieniu 8 m (prowokacja sprawia, że potwory skupiają się tylko na tobie).

Compatível com Gema de Provocação: Se você tiver uma gema Cornalina equipada em sua machadinha, a habilidade causa Provocação de 8.0 s a todos os inimigos num raio de 8 m. (Provocação faz os monstros se concentrarem só em você.)

subjects.name: Accumulated Power
subjects.description: After 3 successful light attacks against the same target: gain Empower, granting a {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_3AtkEmpower.DMGSlash * 100]}% damage increase for {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_3AtkEmpower.DurationMax]} seconds or until the next attack.
subjects.parsed_description: After 3 successful light attacks against the same target: gain Empower, granting a 30.0% damage increase for 3.0 seconds or until the next attack.
subjects.en_description: After 3 successful light attacks against the same target: gain Empower, granting a {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_3AtkEmpower.DMGSlash * 100]}% damage increase for {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_3AtkEmpower.DurationMax]} seconds or until the next attack.
subjects.de_description: Nach 3 erfolgreichen leichten Angriffen gegen dasselbe Ziel erhältst du „Ermächtigung“, wodurch dein Schaden für {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_3AtkEmpower.DurationMax]} Sek. oder bis zum nächsten Angriff um {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_3AtkEmpower.DMGSlash * 100]} % steigt.
subjects.fr_description: 3 attaques légères réussies contre la même cible vous confèrent renforcement et {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_3AtkEmpower.DMGSlash * 100]} % de dégâts supplémentaires pendant {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_3AtkEmpower.DurationMax]} secondes ou jusqu'à la prochaine attaque.
subjects.es_description: Tras 3 ataques ligeros certeros sobre el mismo objetivo, obtienes Fortalecimiento, que concede un aumento del daño del {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_3AtkEmpower.DMGSlash * 100]} % durante {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_3AtkEmpower.DurationMax]} s o hasta el siguiente ataque.
subjects.it_description: Dopo 3 attacchi leggeri riusciti contro lo stesso bersaglio, ottieni Potenziamento, che aumenta i danni di un {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_3AtkEmpower.DMGSlash * 100]}% per {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_3AtkEmpower.DurationMax]} secondi o fino all'attacco successivo.
subjects.pl_description: Po trafieniu tego samego celu trzema lekkimi atakami zyskujesz wzmocnienie zapewniające {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_3AtkEmpower.DMGSlash * 100]}% do zadawanych obrażeń na {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_3AtkEmpower.DurationMax]} s lub do następnego ataku.
subjects.pt_description: Após 3 Ataques Leves bem-sucedidos contra o mesmo alvo: ganha Energizado, aumentando o dano em {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_3AtkEmpower.DMGSlash * 100]}% durante {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_3AtkEmpower.DurationMax]} segundos ou até o próximo ataque.
subjects.en_parsed_description: After 3 successful light attacks against the same target: gain Empower, granting a 30.0% damage increase for 3.0 seconds or until the next attack.

subjects.name: Enraged Strikes
subjects.description: If target is below {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_LightHeavyVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}% health. Light and Heavy attacks deal {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_LightHeavyVsLowHP.BaseDamage * 100]}% more damage.
subjects.parsed_description: If target is below 30.0% health. Light and Heavy attacks deal 20.0% more damage.
subjects.en_description: If target is below {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_LightHeavyVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}% health. Light and Heavy attacks deal {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_LightHeavyVsLowHP.BaseDamage * 100]}% more damage.
subjects.de_description: Wenn das Ziel weniger als {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_LightHeavyVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]} % Gesundheit hat: Leichte und schwere Angriffe verursachen {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_LightHeavyVsLowHP.BaseDamage * 100]} % mehr Schaden.
subjects.fr_description: Si la santé de la cible est inférieure à {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_LightHeavyVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]} %, les attaques légères et lourdes infligent {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_LightHeavyVsLowHP.BaseDamage * 100]} % de dégâts supplémentaires.
subjects.es_description: Si el objetivo tiene menos del {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_LightHeavyVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]} % de salud, los ataques ligeros y pesados infligen un {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_LightHeavyVsLowHP.BaseDamage * 100]} % más de daño.
subjects.it_description: Se il bersaglio ha salute inferiore a un{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_LightHeavyVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}%. Gli attacchi pesanti e leggeri infliggono un {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_LightHeavyVsLowHP.BaseDamage * 100]}% di danni in più.
subjects.pl_description: Jeśli cel ma poniżej {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_LightHeavyVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}% zdrowia, lekkie i ciężkie ataki zadają {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_LightHeavyVsLowHP.BaseDamage * 100]}% więcej obrażeń.
subjects.pt_description: Se o alvo estiver com Saúde abaixo de {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_LightHeavyVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}%, Ataques Leves e Pesados causam {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_LightHeavyVsLowHP.BaseDamage * 100]}% mais dano.

subjects.name: On The Hunt
subjects.description: Increases movement speed by {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk_SpeedUp.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% while in Berserk Mode.
subjects.parsed_description: Increases movement speed by 20.0% while in Berserk Mode.
subjects.en_description: Increases movement speed by {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk_SpeedUp.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% while in Berserk Mode.
subjects.de_description: Im Berserkermodus steigt das Bewegungstempo um {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk_SpeedUp.MoveSpeedMod * 100]} %.
subjects.fr_description: Augmente la vitesse de déplacement de {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk_SpeedUp.MoveSpeedMod * 100]} % lorsque le mode Rage est actif.
subjects.es_description: Aumenta un {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk_SpeedUp.MoveSpeedMod * 100]} % la velocidad de movimiento al activar el modo Furia.

subjects.name: Desperate Refresh
subjects.description: All cooldowns are reduced by {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_CDRAtLowHP.CooldownTimer * -100]}% when hitting an enemy with an attack while your HP is below {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_CDRAtLowHP.MyHealthPercent]}%
subjects.parsed_description: All cooldowns are reduced by 2.0% when hitting an enemy with an attack while your HP is below 30.0%
subjects.en_description: All cooldowns are reduced by {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_CDRAtLowHP.CooldownTimer * -100]}% when hitting an enemy with an attack while your HP is below {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_CDRAtLowHP.MyHealthPercent]}%
subjects.de_description: Alle Abklingzeiten werden um {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_CDRAtLowHP.CooldownTimer * -100]} % verringert, wenn du einen Gegner triffst, dessen Gesundheit unter {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_CDRAtLowHP.MyHealthPercent]} % liegt.
subjects.fr_description: Tous les temps de recharge sont réduits de {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_CDRAtLowHP.CooldownTimer * -100]} % lorsque vous frappez un ennemi et que vos PV sont inférieurs à {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_CDRAtLowHP.MyHealthPercent]} %.
subjects.es_description: Todos los tiempos de recarga se reducen en un {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_CDRAtLowHP.CooldownTimer * -100]} % al acertar a un enemigo con un ataque mientras tu salud está por debajo del {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_CDRAtLowHP.MyHealthPercent]} %.
subjects.it_description: Tutti i tempi di ricarica sono ridotti di un {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_CDRAtLowHP.CooldownTimer * -100]}% quando colpisci un nemico mentre la tua salute è inferiore HP a {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_CDRAtLowHP.MyHealthPercent]}%
subjects.pl_description: Gdy masz poniżej {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_CDRAtLowHP.MyHealthPercent]}% zdrowia i trafisz wroga, wszystkie czasy odnowienia zostaną skrócone o {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_CDRAtLowHP.CooldownTimer * -100]}%.
subjects.pt_description: Todos os tempos de recarga são reduzidos em {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_CDRAtLowHP.CooldownTimer * -100]}% ao atingir um inimigo com um ataque enquanto sua Saúde está abaixo de {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_CDRAtLowHP.MyHealthPercent]}%.
subjects.en_parsed_description: All cooldowns are reduced by 2.0% when hitting an enemy with an attack while your HP is below 30.0%
subjects.de_parsed_description: Alle Abklingzeiten werden um 2.0 % verringert, wenn du einen Gegner triffst, dessen Gesundheit unter 30.0 % liegt.

subjects.name: Feral Rush
subjects.description: A sprinting melee attack that causes the player to leap forward, hitting twice. The first hit deals {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_SprintAttack1.DmgCoef * 100]}% and the 2nd deals {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_SprintAttack2.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage.
subjects.parsed_description: A sprinting melee attack that causes the player to leap forward, hitting twice. The first hit deals 115.0% and the 2nd deals 130.0% weapon damage.
subjects.en_description: A sprinting melee attack that causes the player to leap forward, hitting twice. The first hit deals {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_SprintAttack1.DmgCoef * 100]}% and the 2nd deals {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_SprintAttack2.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage.
subjects.de_description: Bei diesem sprintenden Nahkampfangriff springt der Spieler nach vorn und schlägt zweimal zu. Der erste Angriff verursacht {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_SprintAttack1.DmgCoef * 100]} % Waffenschaden und der zweite Angriff {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_SprintAttack2.DmgCoef * 100]} %.
subjects.fr_description: Une attaque de sprint au corps à corps qui vous fait bondir en avant et frapper deux fois. Le premier coup inflige {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_SprintAttack1.DmgCoef * 100]} % des dégâts de l'arme et le second en inflige {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_SprintAttack2.DmgCoef * 100]} %.
subjects.es_description: Un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo en carrera que hace que el jugador se abalance hacia delante y golpee dos veces. El primer impacto inflige un {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_SprintAttack1.DmgCoef * 100]} % y el segundo un {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_SprintAttack2.DmgCoef * 100]} % de daño de arma.
subjects.it_description: Un veloce attacco in mischia che fa balzare in avanti il giocatore, permettendogli di colpire due volte. Il primo colpo infligge un {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_SprintAttack1.DmgCoef * 100]}% e il 2° un {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_SprintAttack2.DmgCoef * 100]}% dei danni da arma.
subjects.pl_description: Atak wręcz wykonywany podczas biegu: zaszarżuj i zadaj dwa ciosy. Pierwszy cios zadaje {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_SprintAttack1.DmgCoef * 100]}% obrażeń od broni, drugi {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_SprintAttack2.DmgCoef * 100]}%.
subjects.pt_description: Um ataque corpo a corpo veloz que faz com que o jogador salte para frente, acertando duas vezes. O primeiro acerto causa {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_SprintAttack1.DmgCoef * 100]}% e o segundo {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_SprintAttack2.DmgCoef * 100]}% do dano de arma.

subjects.name: Against All Odds
subjects.description: Increase base damage by {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_DMGPerNearbyEnemy.BaseDamage * 100]}% for every enemy within {[SpellDataTable_Hatchet.Hatchet_DmgPerNearbyEnemy_Detection.Radius]} meters of player.

subjects.en_description: Increase base damage by {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_DMGPerNearbyEnemy.BaseDamage * 100]}% for every enemy within {[SpellDataTable_Hatchet.Hatchet_DmgPerNearbyEnemy_Detection.Radius]} meters of player.
subjects.de_description: Erhöht den Basisschaden für jeden Gegner im Umkreis von {[SpellDataTable_Hatchet.Hatchet_DmgPerNearbyEnemy_Detection.Radius]} m um den Spieler um {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_DMGPerNearbyEnemy.BaseDamage * 100]} %.
subjects.fr_description: Augmente les dégâts de base de {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_DMGPerNearbyEnemy.BaseDamage * 100]} % pour chaque ennemi dans un rayon de {[SpellDataTable_Hatchet.Hatchet_DmgPerNearbyEnemy_Detection.Radius]} mètres du joueur.
subjects.es_description: Aumenta el daño base en un {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_DMGPerNearbyEnemy.BaseDamage * 100]} % por cada enemigo que esté a menos de {[SpellDataTable_Hatchet.Hatchet_DmgPerNearbyEnemy_Detection.Radius]} m del jugador.
subjects.it_description: Aumenta i danni base di un {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_DMGPerNearbyEnemy.BaseDamage * 100]}% per ogni nemico a meno di {[SpellDataTable_Hatchet.Hatchet_DmgPerNearbyEnemy_Detection.Radius]} metri dal giocatore.
subjects.pl_description: Zwiększa obrażenia podstawowe o {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_DMGPerNearbyEnemy.BaseDamage * 100]}% za każdego wroga znajdującego się w promieniu {[SpellDataTable_Hatchet.Hatchet_DmgPerNearbyEnemy_Detection.Radius]} metrów od ciebie.
subjects.pt_description: Aumenta o dano base em {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_DMGPerNearbyEnemy.BaseDamage * 100]}% para cada inimigo em um raio de {[SpellDataTable_Hatchet.Hatchet_DmgPerNearbyEnemy_Detection.Radius]} m do jogador.
subjects.en_parsed_description: Increase base damage by 10.0% for every enemy within 5.0 meters of player.
subjects.de_parsed_description: Erhöht den Basisschaden für jeden Gegner im Umkreis von 5.0 m um den Spieler um 10.0 %.

subjects.pt_parsed_description: Aumenta o dano base em 10.0% para cada inimigo em um raio de 5.0 m do jogador.

subjects.name: Dispatch
subjects.description: If target is below {[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_FeralRush_DMGVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}% health, Feral Rush deals {[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_FeralRush_DMGVsLowHP.BaseDamage * 100]}% more damage.
subjects.parsed_description: If target is below 30.0% health, Feral Rush deals 20.0% more damage.
subjects.en_description: If target is below {[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_FeralRush_DMGVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}% health, Feral Rush deals {[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_FeralRush_DMGVsLowHP.BaseDamage * 100]}% more damage.
subjects.de_description: Wenn das Ziel weniger als {[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_FeralRush_DMGVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]} % Gesundheit hat, verursacht „Wilder Ansturm“ {[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_FeralRush_DMGVsLowHP.BaseDamage * 100]} % mehr Schaden.
subjects.fr_description: Si la santé de la cible est inférieure à {[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_FeralRush_DMGVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]} %, Ruée féroce inflige {[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_FeralRush_DMGVsLowHP.BaseDamage * 100]} % de dégâts supplémentaires.
subjects.es_description: Si el objetivo tiene menos del {[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_FeralRush_DMGVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]} % de salud, Ímpetu bestial inflige un {[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_FeralRush_DMGVsLowHP.BaseDamage * 100]} % más de daño.
subjects.it_description: Se il bersaglio ha salute inferiore a un {[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_FeralRush_DMGVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}%, Carica selvaggia infligge un {[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_FeralRush_DMGVsLowHP.BaseDamage * 100]}% di danni in più.

subjects.pt_description: Se o alvo estiver com Saúde abaixo de {[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_FeralRush_DMGVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}%, o Salto Feroz causa {[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_FeralRush_DMGVsLowHP.BaseDamage * 100]}% mais dano.

subjects.name: Berserking Refresh
subjects.description: While Berserk is active, gain a portion of your health back every {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk_Escalading_Health.TickRate]} seconds to a max of 30% of max HP.
subjects.parsed_description: While Berserk is active, gain a portion of your health back every 4.0 seconds to a max of 30% of max HP.
subjects.en_description: While Berserk is active, gain a portion of your health back every {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk_Escalading_Health.TickRate]} seconds to a max of 30% of max HP.

subjects.fr_description: Tant que le mode Rage est actif, vous regagnez une partie de votre santé toutes les {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk_Escalading_Health.TickRate]} s pour un maximum de 30 % de votre total de PV.

subjects.it_description: Mentre Berserker è attivo, recuperi parte della salute ogni {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk_Escalading_Health.TickRate]} secondi, fino a un massimo del 30% della salute massima.
subjects.pl_description: W trybie berserkera odzyskujesz część zdrowia co {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk_Escalading_Health.TickRate]} s., aż do uzyskania maks. 30% swojej maksymalnej liczby PZ.

subjects.description: Perform four fast attacks each dealing {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_RapidStrikes.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage.

subjects.de_description: Führt vier schnelle Angriffe aus, die jeweils {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_RapidStrikes.DmgCoef * 100]} % Waffenschaden verursachen.
subjects.fr_description: Quatre attaques rapides qui infligent chacune {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_RapidStrikes.DmgCoef * 100]} % des dégâts de l'arme.

subjects.it_description: Esegue quattro attacchi rapidi, ciascuno capace di infliggere un {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_RapidStrikes.DmgCoef * 100]}% dei danni da arma.

subjects.name: Aggressive Approach
subjects.description: Hitting a target with Raging Torrent grants Haste, increasing movement speed by {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Raging_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% for {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Raging_Haste.BaseDuration]} seconds.
subjects.parsed_description: Hitting a target with Raging Torrent grants Haste, increasing movement speed by 20.0% for 6.0 seconds.
subjects.en_description: Hitting a target with Raging Torrent grants Haste, increasing movement speed by {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Raging_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% for {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Raging_Haste.BaseDuration]} seconds.
subjects.de_description: Nach einem Treffer mit „Tosende Fluten“ erhältst du Eile, wodurch sich dein Bewegungstempo für {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Raging_Haste.BaseDuration]} Sekunden um {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Raging_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]} % erhöht.
subjects.fr_description: Frapper une cible avec Torrent enragé confère célérité et augmente la vitesse de déplacement de {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Raging_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]} % pendant {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Raging_Haste.BaseDuration]} secondes.
subjects.es_description: Al impactar en un objetivo con Torrente enfurecido causas Celeridad, con lo que aumenta tu velocidad de movimiento en un {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Raging_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]} % durante {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Raging_Haste.BaseDuration]} s.
subjects.it_description: Colpire un bersaglio con Torrente furioso fornisce Fretta e aumenta la velocità di movimento di un {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Raging_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% per {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Raging_Haste.BaseDuration]} secondi.
subjects.pl_description: Trafienie celu rwącym potokiem daje przyspieszenie zwiększające szybkość ruchu o {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Raging_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% na {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Raging_Haste.BaseDuration]} s.
subjects.pt_description: Atingir um alvo com Enxurrada Furiosa concede Pressa, aumentando a velocidade de movimento em {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Raging_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% durante {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Raging_Haste.BaseDuration]} s.

subjects.name: Fortifying Strikes
subjects.description: Hitting the same target with {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_FortifyAfter3Attacks.NumConsecutiveHits]} light attacks grants Fortify, increasing damage absorption by {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_Fortify3Atk.ABSStandard * 100]}% for {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_Fortify3Atk.BaseDuration]} seconds.
subjects.parsed_description: Hitting the same target with 3.0 light attacks grants Fortify, increasing damage absorption by 15.0% for 3.0 seconds.
subjects.en_description: Hitting the same target with {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_FortifyAfter3Attacks.NumConsecutiveHits]} light attacks grants Fortify, increasing damage absorption by {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_Fortify3Atk.ABSStandard * 100]}% for {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_Fortify3Atk.BaseDuration]} seconds.
subjects.de_description: Triffst du dasselbe Ziel mit {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_FortifyAfter3Attacks.NumConsecutiveHits]} leichten Angriffen, dann erhältst du Verstärkung, wodurch sich deine Schadensabsorption für {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_Fortify3Atk.BaseDuration]} Sek. um {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_Fortify3Atk.ABSStandard * 100]} erhöht.
subjects.fr_description: Frappez {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_FortifyAfter3Attacks.NumConsecutiveHits]} fois la même cible avec des attaques légères pour obtenir fortification et augmenter votre absorption des dégâts de {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_Fortify3Atk.ABSStandard * 100]} % pendant {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_Fortify3Atk.BaseDuration]} secondes.
subjects.es_description: Al impactar en el mismo objetivo con {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_FortifyAfter3Attacks.NumConsecutiveHits]} ataques ligeros se obtiene Fortificación, lo que aumenta la absorción del daño en un {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_Fortify3Atk.ABSStandard * 100]} % durante {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_Fortify3Atk.BaseDuration]} s.
subjects.it_description: Colpendo lo stesso bersaglio con {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_FortifyAfter3Attacks.NumConsecutiveHits]} attacchi leggeri ottieni Fortificazione, aumentando l'assorbimento dei danni di un {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_Fortify3Atk.ABSStandard * 100]}% per {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_Fortify3Atk.BaseDuration]} secondi.
subjects.pl_description: Trafienie tego samego celu {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_FortifyAfter3Attacks.NumConsecutiveHits]} lekkimi atakami zapewnia umocnienie zwiększające pochłanianie obrażeń o {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_Fortify3Atk.ABSStandard * 100]}% na {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_Fortify3Atk.BaseDuration]} s.
subjects.pt_description: Atingir o mesmo alvo com {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_FortifyAfter3Attacks.NumConsecutiveHits]} Ataques Leves concede Reforço, aumentando a absorção de dano em {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_Fortify3Atk.ABSStandard * 100]}% durante {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_Fortify3Atk.BaseDuration]} s.

subjects.pt_parsed_description: Atingir o mesmo alvo com 3.0 Ataques Leves concede Reforço, aumentando a absorção de dano em 15.0% durante 3.0 s.

subjects.description: Triggering Berserk removes all Crowd Control effects (Stuns, Slows, Roots) from the player.

subjects.name: Crippling Strikes
subjects.description: If Feral Rush hits a target in the back, it causes Root, immobilizing target for {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Rush_Root.BaseDuration]} seconds.
subjects.parsed_description: If Feral Rush hits a target in the back, it causes Root, immobilizing target for 2.0 seconds.

subjects.pt_description: Se o Salto Feroz atingir um alvo pelas costas, causa Enraizado, imobilizando o alvo durante {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Rush_Root.BaseDuration]} s.

subjects.name: Uninterruptible Berserk
subjects.description: While in Berserk, your attacks are uninterruptible during Berserk and you can't be staggered.

subjects.name: Frenzied Purge
subjects.description: When hitting an enemy while your health is below {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_PurgeDoTLowHP.MyHealthPercent]}%: Removes all Bleed, Burn, and Poison DoT effects from the player. ({[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_DoTPurgeTimer.BaseDuration]} second cooldown)
subjects.parsed_description: When hitting an enemy while your health is below 30.0%: Removes all Bleed, Burn, and Poison DoT effects from the player. (60.0 second cooldown)
subjects.en_description: When hitting an enemy while your health is below {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_PurgeDoTLowHP.MyHealthPercent]}%: Removes all Bleed, Burn, and Poison DoT effects from the player. ({[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_DoTPurgeTimer.BaseDuration]} second cooldown)
subjects.de_description: Wenn du einen Gegner triffst und deine Gesundheit unter {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_PurgeDoTLowHP.MyHealthPercent]} % liegt: Entfernt alle Schaden-über-Zeit-Statuseffekte wie „Blutung“, „Verbrennung“ oder „Vergiftung“ vom Spieler. (Abklingzeit: {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_DoTPurgeTimer.BaseDuration]} Sekunden)
subjects.fr_description: Lorsque votre santé est inférieure à {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_PurgeDoTLowHP.MyHealthPercent]} % et que vous frappez un ennemi, Retire tous les effets de dégâts prolongés du joueur (saignement, brûlure et poison). {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_DoTPurgeTimer.BaseDuration]}s de temps de recharge.
subjects.es_description: Al impactar en un enemigo mientras tu salud está por debajo del {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_PurgeDoTLowHP.MyHealthPercent]} %, Elimina todos los efectos de Sangrado, Quemadura y Veneno del jugador (tiempo de recarga: {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_DoTPurgeTimer.BaseDuration]} s).
subjects.it_description: Quando colpisci un nemico mentre la tua salute è inferiore a {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_PurgeDoTLowHP.MyHealthPercent]}%: Rimuove tutti gli effetti nel tempo di Sanguinamento, Bruciatura e Veleno dal giocatore. (Tempo di ricarica: {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_DoTPurgeTimer.BaseDuration]} sec.)
subjects.pl_description: Gdy masz poniżej {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_PurgeDoTLowHP.MyHealthPercent]}% zdrowia i trafisz wroga, Ciążące na tobie efekty krwawienia, podpalenia i zatrucia zostaną usunięte (czas odnowienia: {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_DoTPurgeTimer.BaseDuration]} s).
subjects.pt_description: Ao atingir um inimigo com Saúde abaixo de {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_PurgeDoTLowHP.MyHealthPercent]}%: Remove todos os efeitos de Hemorragia, Queimadura e Veneno do jogador. (Tempo de recarga de {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Pass_DoTPurgeTimer.BaseDuration]} s.)

subjects.name: Final Blow
subjects.description: Press Light Attack at the end of raging torrent to deal a final attack dealing {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_RapidStrikes_FinalBlow.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage.
subjects.parsed_description: Press Light Attack at the end of raging torrent to deal a final attack dealing 120.0% weapon damage.
subjects.en_description: Press Light Attack at the end of raging torrent to deal a final attack dealing {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_RapidStrikes_FinalBlow.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage.
subjects.de_description: Setze am Ende von „Tosende Fluten“ einen leichten Angriff ein, um einen finalen Angriff durchzuführen, der {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_RapidStrikes_FinalBlow.DmgCoef * 100]} % Waffenschaden verursacht.
subjects.fr_description: À la fin de Torrent enragé, appuyez sur Attaque légère pour réaliser une attaque infligeant {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_RapidStrikes_FinalBlow.DmgCoef * 100]} % des dégâts de l'arme.
subjects.es_description: Pulsa ataque ligero al final de Torrente enfurecido para lanzar un ataque final que inflige un {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_RapidStrikes_FinalBlow.DmgCoef * 100]} % de daño de arma.
subjects.it_description: Premi Attacco leggero al termine di Torrente furioso per eseguire un colpo finale che infligge un {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_RapidStrikes_FinalBlow.DmgCoef * 100]}% dei danni da arma.
subjects.pl_description: Przeprowadź lekki atak na końcu rwącego potoku, by wyprowadzić ostatni cios, zadający {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_RapidStrikes_FinalBlow.DmgCoef * 100]}% obrażeń od broni.
subjects.pt_description: Pressione Ataque Leve no final da Enxurrada Furiosa para dar um ataque final, causando {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_RapidStrikes_FinalBlow.DmgCoef * 100]}% do dano de arma.
subjects.en_parsed_description: Press Light Attack at the end of raging torrent to deal a final attack dealing 120.0% weapon damage.
subjects.de_parsed_description: Setze am Ende von „Tosende Fluten“ einen leichten Angriff ein, um einen finalen Angriff durchzuführen, der 120.0 % Waffenschaden verursacht.

subjects.name: Defy Death
subjects.description: When you receive lethal damage: Avoid death, reduce to {[HatchetAbilityTable.Ult_Passive_Hatchet_ImmortalWhen0HP.SetHealthOnFatalDamageTaken]} HP and gain immortality for {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk_Immortal.BaseDuration]} seconds. ({[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Ult_ImmortalTimer.BaseDuration]}s cooldown)
subjects.parsed_description: When you receive lethal damage: Avoid death, reduce to 0.0 HP and gain immortality for 3.0 seconds. (75.0s cooldown)
subjects.en_description: When you receive lethal damage: Avoid death, reduce to {[HatchetAbilityTable.Ult_Passive_Hatchet_ImmortalWhen0HP.SetHealthOnFatalDamageTaken]} HP and gain immortality for {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk_Immortal.BaseDuration]} seconds. ({[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Ult_ImmortalTimer.BaseDuration]}s cooldown)
subjects.de_description: Wenn du einen tödlichen Treffer erleidest: Du stirbst nicht, deine GES sinkt auf {[HatchetAbilityTable.Ult_Passive_Hatchet_ImmortalWhen0HP.SetHealthOnFatalDamageTaken]} und du bist für {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk_Immortal.BaseDuration]} Sekunden unsterblich. (Abklingzeit: {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Ult_ImmortalTimer.BaseDuration]} Sekunden)
subjects.fr_description: Lorsque vous subissez des dégâts mortels, Vous évitez la mort, vos PV descendent à {[HatchetAbilityTable.Ult_Passive_Hatchet_ImmortalWhen0HP.SetHealthOnFatalDamageTaken]} et vous obtenez l'immortalité pendant {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk_Immortal.BaseDuration]} secondes ({[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Ult_ImmortalTimer.BaseDuration]}s de temps de recharge).
subjects.es_description: Al recibir daño letal, evitas la muerte, reduces tu salud a {[HatchetAbilityTable.Ult_Passive_Hatchet_ImmortalWhen0HP.SetHealthOnFatalDamageTaken]} y obtienes inmortalidad durante {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk_Immortal.BaseDuration]} segundos (tiempo de recarga: {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Ult_ImmortalTimer.BaseDuration]} s).
subjects.it_description: Quando subisci danni letali: eviti la morte, riduci la salute a {[HatchetAbilityTable.Ult_Passive_Hatchet_ImmortalWhen0HP.SetHealthOnFatalDamageTaken]} e ottieni l'immortalità per {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk_Immortal.BaseDuration]} sec. (tempo di ricarica {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Ult_ImmortalTimer.BaseDuration]} sec.)
subjects.pl_description: Gdy otrzymasz śmiertelne obrażenia, unikniesz śmierci, twój poziom zdrowia zostanie zmniejszony do {[HatchetAbilityTable.Ult_Passive_Hatchet_ImmortalWhen0HP.SetHealthOnFatalDamageTaken]} i zyskasz nieśmiertelność na {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk_Immortal.BaseDuration]} s (czas odnowienia: {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Ult_ImmortalTimer.BaseDuration]} s).
subjects.pt_description: Quando recebe dano letal: Evita a morte, reduz a Saúde para {[HatchetAbilityTable.Ult_Passive_Hatchet_ImmortalWhen0HP.SetHealthOnFatalDamageTaken]} e ganha imortalidade durante {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Berserk_Immortal.BaseDuration]} s (tempo de recarga de {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Ult_ImmortalTimer.BaseDuration]} s).

subjects.name: Aimed Throw
subjects.description: Replaces block with an Aimed Throw that deals {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_AimedThrow.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage. Hold RMB to enter aimed stance. Each throw consumes {[StaminaCosts_Player.ThrowingAxe_AimedThrow.StaminaCost]} Stamina.
subjects.parsed_description: Replaces block with an Aimed Throw that deals 95.0% weapon damage. Hold RMB to enter aimed stance. Each throw consumes 20.0 Stamina.
subjects.en_description: Replaces block with an Aimed Throw that deals {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_AimedThrow.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage. Hold RMB to enter aimed stance. Each throw consumes {[StaminaCosts_Player.ThrowingAxe_AimedThrow.StaminaCost]} Stamina.
subjects.de_description: Ersetzt Blocken mit Gezielter Wurf, der {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_AimedThrow.DmgCoef * 100]} % Waffenschaden verursacht. Halte RMT gedrückt, um in die Zielhaltung zu wechseln. Jeder Wurf verbraucht {[StaminaCosts_Player.ThrowingAxe_AimedThrow.StaminaCost]} Ausdauer.

Maintenez BDS pour adopter une posture de visée. Chaque lancer consomme {[StaminaCosts_Player.ThrowingAxe_AimedThrow.StaminaCost]} points de vitalité.
subjects.es_description: Reemplaza Bloquear con un Lanzamiento preciso que inflige un {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_AimedThrow.DmgCoef * 100]} % de daño de arma. subjects.it_description: Sostituisce la parata con un Lancio mirato che infligge un {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_AimedThrow.DmgCoef * 100]}% dei danni da arma. subjects.name: Critical Throw
subjects.description: Thrown axes are now capable of triggering headshot or random critical hit.\n\nAlso increases critical hit chance of all attacks by 5%.
subjects.parsed_description:
Thrown axes are now capable of triggering headshot or random critical hit.

Also increases critical hit chance of all attacks by 5%.
subjects.en_description: Thrown axes are now capable of triggering headshot or random critical hit.\n\nAlso increases critical hit chance of all attacks by 5%.
subjects.de_description: Geworfene Äxte können nun einen Kopfschuss oder zufälligen kritischen Treffer auslöschen.\n\nDie kritische Trefferchance aller Angriffe steigt um 5 %.
subjects.fr_description: Les haches lancées peuvent maintenant déclencher un tir à la tête ou un coup critique.\n\nAugmente également de 5 % les chances de coup critique.
subjects.es_description: Ahora, las hachas arrojadas pueden causar un disparo a la cabeza o un impacto crítico aleatorio.\n\nTambién aumenta la probabilidad de golpe crítico de todos los ataques en un 5 %.
subjects.it_description: Ora le asce lanciate sono in grado di attivare colpi alla testa o colpi critici casuali.\n\nAumenta inoltre la probabilità di colpo critico di tutti gli attacchi del 5%.
subjects.pl_description: Rzut siekierką może trafić cel w głowę lub zadać obrażenia krytyczne.\n\nPonadto zwiększa szansę na trafienie krytyczne wszystkich ataków o 5%.
subjects.pt_description: Machados arremessados agora são capazes de acionar um tiro na cabeça ou um acerto crítico aleatório.\n\nTambém aumenta a chance de acerto crítico de todos os ataques em 5%.
subjects.en_parsed_description:
Thrown axes are now capable of triggering headshot or random critical hit.

Also increases critical hit chance of all attacks by 5%.
subjects.de_parsed_description:
Geworfene Äxte können nun einen Kopfschuss oder zufälligen kritischen Treffer auslöschen.

Die kritische Trefferchance aller Angriffe steigt um 5 %.
subjects.fr_parsed_description:
Les haches lancées peuvent maintenant déclencher un tir à la tête ou un coup critique.

Augmente également de 5 % les chances de coup critique.
subjects.es_parsed_description:
Ahora, las hachas arrojadas pueden causar un disparo a la cabeza o un impacto crítico aleatorio.

También aumenta la probabilidad de golpe crítico de todos los ataques en un 5 %.
subjects.it_parsed_description:
Ora le asce lanciate sono in grado di attivare colpi alla testa o colpi critici casuali.

Aumenta inoltre la probabilità di colpo critico di tutti gli attacchi del 5%.
subjects.pl_parsed_description:
Rzut siekierką może trafić cel w głowę lub zadać obrażenia krytyczne.

Ponadto zwiększa szansę na trafienie krytyczne wszystkich ataków o 5%.
subjects.pt_parsed_description:
Machados arremessados agora são capazes de acionar um tiro na cabeça ou um acerto crítico aleatório.

Também aumenta a chance de acerto crítico de todos os ataques em 5%.

subjects.name: Rending Throw
subjects.description: Throw an axe dealing {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_RendingThrow.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and applying Rend, reducing target's damage absorption by {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_RendingThrow_Rend.ABSStandard * -100]}% for {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_RendingThrow_Rend.BaseDuration]}s.
subjects.parsed_description: Throw an axe dealing 110.0% weapon damage and applying Rend, reducing target's damage absorption by 10.0% for 10.0s.
subjects.en_description: Throw an axe dealing {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_RendingThrow.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and applying Rend, reducing target's damage absorption by {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_RendingThrow_Rend.ABSStandard * -100]}% for {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_RendingThrow_Rend.BaseDuration]}s.
subjects.de_description: Du wirfst eine Axt, was {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_RendingThrow.DmgCoef * 100]} % Waffenschaden verursacht und beim Ziel den Statuseffekt „Aufgerissen“ erzeugt, wodurch dessen Schadensabsorption für {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_RendingThrow_Rend.BaseDuration]} Sek. um {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_RendingThrow_Rend.ABSStandard * -100]} % sinkt.
subjects.fr_description: Lance une hache qui inflige {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_RendingThrow.DmgCoef * 100]} % des dégâts de l'arme et applique lacération, ce qui réduit de {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_RendingThrow_Rend.ABSStandard * -100]} % l'absorption des dégâts de la cible pendant {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_RendingThrow_Rend.BaseDuration]}s.

subjects.name: Social Distancing

Die Axt verursacht {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_SocialDistancing.DmgCoef * 100]} % Waffenschaden und verlangsamt das Ziel für {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_SocialDist_Slow.BaseDuration]} Sekunden um {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_SocialDist_Slow.MoveSpeedMod * -100]} %.

subjects.name: Targeted Impact
subjects.description: Rend increased to {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_RendingThrow_RendBuff.ABSStandard * -100]}% if further than {[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_RendThrow_DistanceBuffRend.DistFromDefender]} meters from target.

subjects.de_description: „Aufgerissen“ erhöht sich auf {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_RendingThrow_RendBuff.ABSStandard * -100]} %, wenn das Ziel mehr als {[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_RendThrow_DistanceBuffRend.DistFromDefender]} m von dir entfernt war.

subjects.es_description: Desgarro aumenta al {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_RendingThrow_RendBuff.ABSStandard * -100]} % si estás a más de {[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_RendThrow_DistanceBuffRend.DistFromDefender]} metros del objetivo.
subjects.it_description: Lacerato viene aumentato a {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_RendingThrow_RendBuff.ABSStandard * -100]}% se il bersaglio di trova a più di {[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_RendThrow_DistanceBuffRend.DistFromDefender]} metri.
subjects.pl_description: Jeśli znajdujesz się dalej niż {[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_RendThrow_DistanceBuffRend.DistFromDefender]} m od celu, zwiększa wartość rozdarcia do {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_RendingThrow_RendBuff.ABSStandard * -100]}%.
subjects.pt_description: Vulnerável é aumentado em {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_RendingThrow_RendBuff.ABSStandard * -100]}% se estiver a mais de {[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_RendThrow_DistanceBuffRend.DistFromDefender]} metros do alvo.

subjects.name: Infected Throw
subjects.description:
Throw an axe that deals {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_InfectedThrow.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and triggers Disease and weakens target for {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Infected_DiseaseWeak.BaseDuration]}s. 

 (Disease reduces targets healing efficiency by {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Infected_DiseaseWeak.HealMod * -100]}%)
(Weaken reduces target's damage by {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Infected_DiseaseWeak.DMGStandard * -100]}%).
subjects.parsed_description:

(Disease reduces targets healing efficiency by 30.0%)
(Weaken reduces target's damage by 10.0%).
subjects.en_description:
Throw an axe that deals {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_InfectedThrow.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and triggers Disease and weakens target for {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Infected_DiseaseWeak.BaseDuration]}s. 

 (Disease reduces targets healing efficiency by {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Infected_DiseaseWeak.HealMod * -100]}%)
(Weaken reduces target's damage by {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Infected_DiseaseWeak.DMGStandard * -100]}%).

Der Axtwurf verursacht {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_InfectedThrow.DmgCoef * 100]} % Waffenschaden und löst Krankheit aus, was das Ziel für {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Infected_DiseaseWeak.BaseDuration]} Sek. schwächt.

(Schwächung verringert den durch das Ziel verursachten Schaden um {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Infected_DiseaseWeak.DMGStandard * -100]} %.)
subjects.fr_description:
Lancez une hache qui inflige {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_InfectedThrow.DmgCoef * 100]} % des dégâts de l'arme, déclenche maladie et affaiblit la cible pendant {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Infected_DiseaseWeak.BaseDuration]}s. 

 (maladie réduit de {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Infected_DiseaseWeak.HealMod * -100]} % l'efficacité des soins de la cible)
(faiblesse réduit de {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Infected_DiseaseWeak.DMGStandard * -100]} % les dégâts de la cible).
subjects.es_description:
Arroja un hacha que inflige un {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_InfectedThrow.DmgCoef * 100]} % de daño de arma, activa Enfermedad y debilita al objetivo durante {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Infected_DiseaseWeak.BaseDuration]} s. 

 (Enfermedad reduce la eficiencia de curación del objetivo en un {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Infected_DiseaseWeak.HealMod * -100]} %)
(Debilitamiento reduce el daño del objetivo en un {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Infected_DiseaseWeak.DMGStandard * -100]} %).

Lancia un'ascia che infligge un {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_InfectedThrow.DmgCoef * 100]}% dei danni da arma, attiva Malattia e indebolisce il bersaglio per {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Infected_DiseaseWeak.BaseDuration]} sec.

(Indebolito riduce i danni del bersaglio di un {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Infected_DiseaseWeak.DMGStandard * -100]}%).
subjects.pl_description:
Rzuć siekierką, zadając {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_InfectedThrow.DmgCoef * 100]}% obrażeń od broni oraz nakładając na cel chorobę i osłabienie na {[StatusEffects.Hatchet_Infected_DiseaseWeak.BaseDuration]} s.
